item.title: Border czar Homan speaks in Minnesota: "I'm staying till the problem's gone"
item.description: Border czar Tom Homan gave his first news conference Thursday morning since arriving in Minnesota at the request of President Trump.

item.title: Dozens confirmed dead as extreme cold continues to grip much of U.S.
item.description: The death toll continues to rise from a massive winter storm that left an ongoing spell of freezing weather in its wake.
